attributes.action: Overturn the decision not to reform communication and culture as an A level subject
attributes.additional_details: On the 27th of January AQA published on their website that the communication and culture A level would not be reformed and thus  not delivered after 2018. This decision will have huge implications for future students because of the value of the subject both academically and culturally. Please sign this petition to urge the Government to re- think this decision and keep communication and culture as an A level subject choice.
